level.heading: MAXIMUM FLOOR AREA RATIO (FAR) – SINGLE BUILDING (§ 11-2907)

level.text: The maximum FAR for any single building in the USN District shall be six and one half (6.5), which shall be computed in accordance with § 2909.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4788, 4798 (June 3, 2011).
